subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Eli Manning and Philip Rivers, the keys to a draft-day trade in 2004, are friendly peers who will meet Sunday for the first time in the N.F.L.
snippet: Eli Manning and Philip Rivers, the keys to a draft-day trade in 2004, are friendly peers who will meet Sunday for the first time in the N.F.L.
